name: Krakatoa
description:
Krakatoa is a single player Action-Adventure/Survival Horror game. Attempt to find your son and escape Siren Head. Listen closely to get an advantage in surviving an onslaught of attacks. Photo-realistic environments integrated with 3D audio bring the experience to life. Succeed in escaping and you'll live to see another day, but you can't run forever.



Looking forward to any feedback as this is my first game and I'm still learning the process.

Thanks for checking it out!
